blueprint.description: Installs netdata, a system metrics collector/dashboard, on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Netdata](https://www.netdata.cloud/) is an open source tool designed to collect real-time metrics, such as CPU usage, disk activity, bandwidth usage, website visits, etc., and then display them in live, easy-to-interpret charts.
blueprint.name: Netdata
blueprint.title: Netdata
